text: Abdelhak Achahbar (born in Utrecht, Netherlands on 29 October 1992) better known as Lijpe mocro is a Dutch rapper of Moroccan origin. He is born in Maarssen. He released his EP Van de bodem naar de grond in 2014 and his debut album Levensles in 2015. His 2016 album Jackpot reached number 2 on the Dutch Albums chart.
